ocean.question: I am big and blue and have lots of water. What am I?
I am a colorful fish that lives in the sea. I have orange and white stripes. Who am I?

hints.text: 🎬You might have seen me in a movie.

ocean.question: I walk sideways on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🚶 I move in a funny way.

ocean.question: I am very big and swim in the ocean. People sometimes watch me jump. What am I?
I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?
I have a shell and move very slowly. I live in the ocean. What am I?
I am a big fish with lots of teeth. I swim in the ocean. What am I?
I look like a star and live on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️I can grow back an arm if it falls off.

ocean.question: I am long and skinny, and I swim like a snake in the ocean. What am I?
I am clear and float in the ocean. I can sting you. What am I?

food.question: I am yellow, you peel me, monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 My color is bright like the sun!
🤸 You need to take off my jacket before eating me.
🐒 Cheeky monkeys love to munch on me.

food.question: I am round and red. You can bite into me. Snow White liked me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 My color is like a firetruck!
🍎 A tasty treat you can eat with a crunch.

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground, like a treasure!
🐇 A crunchy snack for a furry friend.

food.question: I am small and green, and grow in a pod. You can pop me out to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow with my friends in a long green house.
💪 Popeye does not eats me; this hint is applicable to Spinach, not Peas.

food.question: I am made from milk. You can eat me with a spoon. Sometimes, I come in different flavors. What am I?

hints.text: 🥄 I'm delicious out of a cup.
🐄 You need a cow to make me!

food.question: I am brown and crunchy. You can spread jam on me. I am good for breakfast. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 You can toast me for extra flavor.

food.question: I am a vegetable, and when you cut me I can make you cry. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 My layers are like a puzzle!
😭 I make your eyes water when you chop me.
🍲 I am a common ingredient in soups and stews

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast. I am baked in an oven, and can be a circle or a triangle. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 Many shapes and sizes of me are available.
👨‍🍳 People love to spread tomato sauce and cheese on me!

food.question: I am yellow or white, and come from a chicken. You can fry me, scramble me, or boil me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍳 You can cook me in many different ways.
🐔 I am laid by a bird.
🥚 I can be part of breakfast, lunch, or dinner!

food.question: I am made of ground-up seeds, and you can spread me on bread. Some people are allergic to me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 Squirrels also love to eat the original form!
⚠️ Be careful, some people can't eat me.
